text: Aur hum ney unn logon ko jo kay bilkul kamzor shumat kiye jatay thay uss sir zamin kay poorab pachim ka maalik bana diya jiss mein hum ney barkat rakhi hai aur aap kay rab kay nek wada bani israeel kay haq mein unn kay sabar ki waja say poora hogaya aur hum ney firaon kay aur uss ki qom kay saakhita per daakhita kaar khanon ko aur jo kuch woh oonchi oonchi emarten banwatay thay sab ko darhum barhum ker diya
